chatmessages.magnet_init.desc: You must first right-click with the Magnet Card in hand before using the keybind!
jei.wct.desc: A wireless version of the AE2 Crafting Terminal. To function, it needs to be linked to a ME network via a Security Terminal. A keybind can be set in Options->Controls to open the GUI.
jei.magnet_card.desc: A magnet that can automatically insert items into the connected ME network. Crouch+right-click to change modes (modes can also be switched via keybind). Right-click to open filter GUI (this can also be keybound).
